bills.title: Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act
bills.description: A comprehensive bill to federally deschedule cannabis, expunge cannabis-related convictions, and establish a regulatory framework for legal cannabis commerce. Includes provisions for social equity, taxation, and interstate commerce.
bills.last_action: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bills.title: SAFE Banking Act
bills.description: Provides a safe harbor for depository institutions that provide financial services to cannabis-related legitimate businesses. Protects banks and credit unions from federal penalties for serving state-legal cannabis businesses.

bills.title: Medical Marijuana Research Act
bills.description: Streamlines the process for conducting medical marijuana research. Removes barriers that have prevented researchers from studying the medical potential of cannabis. Establishes a new framework for DEA registration of marijuana researchers.
